name: Highway Carnage
description:
A wizard has awoken and doesn't like those cars on his lawn. He sends his minion down to enact revenge and create CARNAGE.

Note: You must click in the game screen area and go to full screen in order to start playing. Seems to be an issue relating to WebGL.

This game is part of the Ludumdare challenege and was created in 72hrs. My friend and I that made it have a rough idea on where to go but suggestions are welcome
